chapter.title: Installation
chapter.para:
This is a Perl application with wxPerl and/or PerlTk graphical user interface. Unpack the distribution file, install the prerequisites
Easy with: "cpanm --installdeps . " if you have App::cpanminus installed. listed in Makefile.PL, than install like any other standard Perl module:

para.programlisting: % tar xaf Tpda-Qrt-0.XX.tar.gz % cd Tpda-Qrt-0.XX % make % make test % make install
